QnA.Question: I have keys but no locks. I have space but no room. You can enter, but you can’t go outside. What am I?
I’m not alive, but I grow; I don’t have lungs, but I need air; I don’t have a mouth, but water kills me. What am I?
In the field of coding, I'm not your love partner, but I can drive you crazy. What am I?
According to the pitcure, what  programming language is this?
